articles.author: Richard Leadbetter
articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: final tech specs and system reservations confirmed - Eurogamer
articles.description: Digital Foundry reveals the final specs - and system reservations - for the Nintendo Switch 2.
articles.content: Nintendo has released its own technical specifications for the Switch 2 console hybrid, but it's fair to say that the detail is somewhat selective - and that's OK. It's been a long time since the fir… [+10409 chars]

articles.title: Three-Eyed “Sea-Moth” Predator From 506 Million Years Ago Stuns Scientists - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Meet Mosura fentoni, a bizarre 506-million-year-old "sea-moth" with three eyes, claws, and an abdomen full of gills.
articles.content: Meet Mosura fentoni, a bizarre 506-million-year-old “sea-moth” with three eyes, claws, and an abdomen full of gills. This ancient predator sheds light on arthropod evolution and reveals stunning inte… [+7257 chars]
